item.title: How many major political parties can coexist in Canada?
item.description: Recently, for an assignment, I had to answer the following question: “Duverger’s Law contends that Single Member Plurality systems produce two party systems dominated by a competition for centrist voters. What are the assumptions behind this argument? How can we explain the main exceptions to this law in the Canadian context?” This is a timely issue.
